p: The value of flavonoid content was 59.34±1.08 mg QE/100 g, and flavonol was 15.08±0.04 mg QE/100 g. Flavonoid content was 0.42 mg QE/100g in citrus honey and 13.962 mg QE/100g in black cumin honey [ 29]. Therefore, the flavonoid content of TVH was higher than that found in citrus honey as well as black cumin honey.
